moves.1. e4 c5: Sicilian ... I didn't expect this. I thought I'd stick to my usual development moves where Black moved e5 ... I know it isn't a good idea
moves.2. Nf3 d6 3. Bc4: In retrospect d4 would have been better
moves.3... Nc6 4. d3: I decide to open my other bishop
moves.6... Be7 7. h3: I didn't want to exchange the knight unless my foe forced me too. So I decided to move h3 as then my foe's white bishop can't pin my knight in the future .. But now I think it was a bad move
moves.7... h6 8. Bxf6 Bxf6 9. O-O a6: My foe wants to capture the queen side
moves.10. a4 Rb8 11. Rb1: This suits me the I can move Ne2 followed by d4
moves.11... b6: My opponent does this to develop his bishop.
moves.12. Ne2 b5: Due to that move my opponent has a change of plans and settles for b5. This is a mistake of my opponent throughout the game. He goes moves down due to such tactics
moves.13. axb5 axb5 14. Bb3 O-O 15. c3: c3 attacking for the center and making space for my bishop
moves.15... Re8 16. d4 c4 17. Bc2: Both me and my opponent think that the game looks pretty jammed
moves.17... Ra8: Black decides to conquer the "a" row however in doing so he goes another move down. He has no game plan another reason why I end up winning
moves.18. b4: Fearing Na5 an intrusion into my base
moves.19. Re1: By this I can take the center (d5) without pawn support
moves.19... d5: I don' t think this is a good move
moves.20. e5 Be7 21. Nh2: I fear f6 so I decide to make space for f4
moves.21... Nb8: Black decides to maneuver his knight and ring it out on his king side ... again wasting moves
moves.22... Nd7 23. Ng3 f5 24. Qh5 Bh4 25. Re3: My foe wants to develop his knight by the king side  ..... If I have to act it must be now blacks position is pathetic
moves.26. Bxf5: Now the fun starts ... If exf then Nxf5 Be7 Nxh6 Qxh6 And then a mate would eventually follow by Rg3 . However if Bxg3 then .....
moves.26... Bxg3 27. Rxg3 exf5 28. Qxh6 Re7: Not my preferred way to defend
moves.29. Qh5 Bc8 30. Nf3: I decide to get my knight into offense
moves.30... Ne6 31. Ng5: But I then got a better idea ... The exchange would favor me
